price: Wontumi nkyerε anifirafoͻ nso kwan mfri wͻn yera no mu. Nea wobɛtumi ama no ate ne obi a ͻgye Yεn nsεm no die na wͻyε Muslim (brε wͻn ho ase ma Nyankopͻn).
arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَٰدِ ٱلۡعُمۡيِ عَن ضَلَٰلَتِهِمۡۖ إِن تُسۡمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤۡمِنُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā anta bihādi al-ʿum'yi ʿan ḍalālatihim in tus'miʿu illā man yu'minu biāyātinā fahum mus'limūna
